examples.example: 我很高兴能在这次活动中认识许多志同道合的朋友。

translate.english: I am very glad to be able to meet many like-minded friends in this activity.

examples.example: 通过这次旅行，我认识了很多有趣的人，收获了难忘的经历。

translate.english: Through this trip, I met a lot of interesting people and gained unforgettable experiences.

examples.example: 认识你真的很开心，让我的生活增添了许多乐趣。

translate.english: Really very happy to know you, which has added a lot of fun to my life.
